resources.string: Decrease or increase your screen brightness by using our app! ðŸ”†
Take control of your screen\'s brightness. Low Brightness allows you to reduce your screen\'s illumination beyond the system\'s default minimum, perfect for comfortable viewing in dark environments.
Dim your screen further than ever before to reduce eye strain, especially during nighttime use or in dimly lit spaces. Enjoy a more comfortable viewing experience.
Fine-tune the screen filter intensity to your exact preference. Find the perfect balance for reading, browsing, or watching videos in low light conditions.
Adjust screen brightness levels and related features
Define how strong the overlay filter should be. Higher levels are recommended for night time reading.
Select the color that you think is least distracting to your eyes and has enough contrast with the apps, typically visible on the screen.
Keep the screen on when the night screen is on
Turn down the screen brightness after startup
Screen brightness will be reduced in
Original brightness will be restored in
Schedule the period when the screen should automatically darken, to reduce eye strain and make it more comfortable to read in dark environments.
Time when your screen brightness will be adjusted to the level you set.
Time when your screen brightness will return to its normal level.
Enable the scheduler to automatically adjust your screen brightness.
Use accessibility service to implement the function of reducing screen brightness
